Atividades Theodo:
Guia 2

01 a) 
a) 0,00011(2) = 0,09375(10)
b) 0,01001(2) = 0.28125(10)
c) 0,10101(2) = 0.65625(10)
d) 1,11101(2) = 1.90625(10)
e) 11,11001(2) = 3,78125(10)

2)
a) 0,375000(10) = 0,011(2)
b) 2,125000(10) = 10,001(2)
c) 3,625000(10) = 11,101(2)
d) 5,03125(10) = 101,00001(2)
e) 6,750000(10) = 110,11(2)

3a)
a)0,0111110(2)= 0,132(4)
b)0,101001(2)= 0,51(8)
c)0,100110(2)= 0,98(16)
d)1,111011(2)= 1,73(8)
e)1101,1001(2)= D,9(16)

4a)
a)0,321(4)=0,101(2)
b)0,3D2(16)=0,1332(4)
c) 0,751(8)=0,111101(2)
d)7,345(8)=3,1311(4)
e)F,A5E(16)=333,2112(4)

05a.) manualmente
a.)101,11(2) + 10,011(2) = 1000,001(2)
b.)1000,101(2) - 10,01(2) = 1000,001(2) 
c.)101,101(2) * 10,101(2) = 10011,010(2) 
d.)10111,01(2) / 11,011(2) = 10011,010(2)
e.)1101011(2) % 1101(2) = 101(2)
